lead_paragraph: Independent medical observers found that the incidence of game-related concussions was seven times the rate found in a study the N.C.A.A. conducted.
snippet: Independent medical observers found that the incidence of game-related concussions was seven times the rate found in a study the N.C.A.A. conducted.

headline.main: Study Finds Concussions in Hockey Underreported
headline.seo: Study Shows Hockey Concussions Are Underreported
headline.print_headline: Study Finds Concussions In Hockey Underreported
